transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Hanji kaun?
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, sir IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Bolie.
Executive: Sir aapko call aaya tha kya keh rahe the aapko?
Customer: Hanji?
Executive: Kya hua tha IndiaMART ke helpline number pe?
Customer: Ha call kiya tha.
Executive: Ji bataiye kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Humne aapko kai baar bola ki hamara payment refund kar dijiye pichle 6 mahine se keh rahe hain par aap log kar nahi rahe ho.
Executive: Hum to aapka payment kara hi nahi sakte.
Customer: IndiaMART hum use hi nahi kar rahe hain aur aapki team mein usse baat ho rahi hai har member call karke bolta hai ki sir hum call back karte hain. 6 mahine se aapki team yahi bahanebazi karti hai ki sir hum call kara rahe hain apne senior se hum aapka wo karaenge ye karaenge aur maine maine pehle hi mana kar diya tha ki mere ko credit nahi karna mera payment refund kar dijiye. Aapki team koi support nahi kar rahi hai.
Executive: Sir refund ki policy kis bihaf matlab kuch aap bataenge agar aap use karenge aapko response na mil raha ho to matlab mujhe bataiye jab aap sir use hi nahi kar rahe kaise refund possible hai?
Customer: Sir dekho nahi kar rahe use na isiliye to payment refund mang rahe hain na kyunki jab first time call hui thi aap logon ke sath na to mere ko galat commitment kiye gaye the.
Executive: Kya galat commitment kiya tha aapko bataiye kya kya galat commitment bataya?
Customer: Suno mujhe kuch nahi pata suno suno suno suno.
Customer: Main aapko short mein bata raha hu aap short mein samajhne ki koshish kare kyunki 6 mahine se main sabko main 6 mahine se ek hi baat bata raha hu aur main batane ke mood mein nahi hu. Agar maine toll free pe maine toll free pe call kiya hai to aap kuch soch samajh sakte ho main aapko ek baat keh raha hu aap dekh lijiye ki aapki team ne kitni baar mere ko call kiya hai hamari kitni baar baat hui hai aur maine hamesha yahi bola hai ki mera payment refund kar dijiye kyunki mere ko galat information deke mere se paisa liya gaya tha. Thik hai? Main jab mere ko ye pata chala ki mere sath galat hua hai to maine usi samay mana kar diya tha. Reject kar diya tha ki mera payment refund kar do baat khatam ho gayi. Hume aage baat hi nahi badhani. Samajh rahe ho aapko baat ko?
Executive: Aapke sath kya aisa ho gaya? Aage ki story mein aapko kya problem aa rahi hai? Aap bolenge matlab aap dekh raha hu aap aapne IndiaMART use hi nahi kiya abhi tak.
Customer: Sir aapki aawaz bahut kat rahi hai kuch samajh mein nahi aa raha. Aap dusre number se bol raha main bol raha hu aapne agar use kiya ho to aapko to samajh mein ki aapne use kiya hai to aapko response nahi aaya customer se.
Customer: Sir mere ko galat cheez mili hai. Mere ko jo cheez deal hui thi wo cheez nahi mili aur jaise hi mujhe pata chala first day maine usi samay mana kar diya ki main main continue nahi rehna chah raha aapke sath baat khatam ho gayi na. Mere sath aap logon ne agar kisi ki aapki team ne fraud kiya hai main continue nahi karna chah raha hu boss to aap samjho na uss cheez ko yaar. Customer se aapne paisa liya hai main apna paisa wapsi mang raha hu aap paisa de do mera.
Executive: [inaudible] dukan se aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi hai aap
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Hello hello aawaz nahi hai?
Customer: Boss nahi aa rahi hai aap dusra number aap dusre mobile number se call kariye isme bilkul aawaz nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji?
Executive: Main keh raha hu aawaz nahi aa rahi hai kya?
Customer: Sir kuch aawaz aa rahi hai kuch kat kat ke aa rahi hai.
Executive: Achcha main keh raha hu na jaise ki aapko item market se purchase karta hu thik hai?
Customer: Hanji?
Executive: Aap item market se purchase thik hai?
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji sir aap sirf ye bataenge item kharab tha isliye main wapas kar raha hu aap bina item ko use kare bol denge maine kharida ab main wapas kar raha hu to aisa possible hota hai ki sir aap bata dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Bahut sari cheez check kar rakhi hai thik hai? Sari cheez check karne ke baad hi bola gaya tha.
Executive: Main sir aapka account check kar raha hu to aap side se hamare sath aapko kafi calls gaye hain ki sir bataiye aap at least use kariye aapko result na mile item na nahi dekho sir suno mere ko chori nahi karna hai. Mere ko ye kaam nahi karna hai ki aapki call bhi receive kar lo aur apna paisa bhi mang lu samajh rahe ho meri baat? Ha ji samajh rahe ho nahi samajh mein nahi aa raha to main dusri baato mein samjhau maine aapki call aa rahi hai main pick nahi kar raha hu ya main main chhod raha hu main interest nahi dikha raha hu usme. Pehle meri baat suniye. Main aisa kaam nahi karna chah raha hu ki main aapse paisa bhi wapsi mang lu aur apni lead bhi kaam karta rahu aisa kaam nahi karna chah raha hu main. Samajh rahe ho na? Agar main nahi kar raha hu response nahi de raha hu to mere ko galat cheez batai gayi maine nahi karna usme continue nahi hona hai yaar mere ko jo cheez batai gayi aapki sales wale ke through wo cheez continue nahi ho pai na aur maine apne jo aapne maine sales wale ne aapko refund policy batai thi kya ke bare mein? Bilkul bola tha sir unhone kaha tha ki 15 din mein refund ho jayega. Main baat to wahi kar raha hu na aapko. To aap call nahi sir wo tumhara banda dobara dobara tumhara banda yaha pe nahi aaya kabhi bhi. Thik hai? Yahi 6 mahine se ek hi baat keh raha hu sir mere ko lagta hai ki sir aap logon ko nahi payment dena hai aapne 30 40 hazar jo mere se le rakhe hain wo data nahi karoge aap mujhe to confirm ho gaya hai. Thik hai? Ha ha ha. Ye to confirm ho gaya tum paisa dene wale mein se nahi ho tumhari company fraud hai kyunki tum paisa nahi de sakte. Ha clear. Aap log fraud nahi hote to jhoot bol ke paisa nahi lete uske baad refund nahi karte mere ko bola gaya tha ki 15 din ke andar andar refund aa jayega. Okay okay to aapse yahi sir bola gaya 15 aap use karenge response nahi samajh sir aapse baat karke lag raha hai mujhe ki bewakoof wali baat hai aapse baat karna aap kuch nahi karne wale thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund of â‚¹30-40k, promised 15-day refund.

- Alleges wrong commitments, fraud by IndiaMART team.

- States IndiaMART services not being used.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund not possible if service unused.

- Executive asked for details of wrong commitment.

- Executive asked to use the services.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund, fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, fraud, commitment, sales
